title: Here's a curated list of 20 notable articles on end-to-end speech translation up to 2021. These articles cover various aspects of the field, including model architectures, training techniques, datasets, and evaluation methods
**"End-to-End Speech Translation without Speech Recognition"**
**"Jointly Learning to Align and Translate with Transformer Models"** - Ankur Bapna
All-in-One Speech Translation Toolkit"** - Hirofumi Inaguma, Tatsuya Kawahara
Fast Speech-to-Text Modeling with Fairseq"** - Changhan Wang, Anne Wu
**"A Comparative Study on End-to-End Speech to Text Translation"**
note: Jan Niehues, Eunah Cho, Thanh-Le Ha, Alex Waibel, 2019.

title: **"End-to-End Speech Translation with Transcoder"** - Changhan Wang, Anne Wu
**"Direct Speech-to-Text Translation with Transformer"** - Ye Jia, Melvin Johnson
**"Librispeech: An ASR Corpus Based on Public Domain Audio Books"** - Vassil Panayotov, Guoguo Chen
**"Speech-Transformer: A No-Recurrence Sequence-to-Sequence Model for Speech Recognition"** - Linhao Dong
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with Self-Supervised Learning"**
**"Improving End-to-End Speech-to-Text Translation with Pre-trained Models and Monolingual Data"** - Eunah Cho
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with Knowledge Distillation"** - Changhan Wang, Anne Wu
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with Pre-trained Models"** - Eunah Cho, Jan Niehues
**"Jointly Learning to Align and Translate with Transformer Models"** - Ankur Bapna
**"Speech-to-Text Translation with Transformer"** - Ye Jia, Melvin Johnson
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with Pre-trained Models and Monolingual Data"** - Eunah Cho
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with Knowledge Distillation"** - Changhan Wang, Anne Wu
**"Jointly Learning to Align and Translate with Transformer Models"** - Ankur Bapna
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with Pre-trained Models"** - Eunah Cho, Jan Niehues
**"Speech-to-Text Translation with Transformer"** - Ye Jia, Melvin Johnson
These articles should provide a comprehensive overview of the advancements in end-to-end speech translation up to 2021
note: You can find these papers on platforms like arXiv, ACL Anthology, or other academic databases.
